# MassMechanic - Auto Repair Matching Service

> MassMechanic connects car owners in Massachusetts with verified local mechanics. Free for drivers, curated network of licensed shops.

## Documentation

- Overview: https://massmechanic.com/docs/
- How It Works: https://massmechanic.com/docs/how-it-works.html
- Service Areas: https://massmechanic.com/docs/service-areas.html
- FAQ: https://massmechanic.com/docs/faq.html
- For Mechanics: https://massmechanic.com/docs/for-mechanics.html

## What is MassMechanic?

MassMechanic is a free service that connects car owners with verified mechanics in Massachusetts. Car owners submit a simple request describing their repair needs, and we match them with 2-3 licensed mechanics in their area who specialize in that type of work.

## Service Areas

Currently serving:
- Greater Brockton, MA
- Fall River, MA
- New Bedford, MA
- Surrounding Massachusetts communities

## How It Works

### For Car Owners (100% Free):
1. Submit a request form with vehicle info and repair description (60 seconds, no account needed)
2. Get matched with 2-3 verified mechanics in your area
3. Compare quotes and choose the best fit
4. Book directly with the mechanic

No fees, no subscriptions, no middleman charges. You pay the mechanic directly at their normal rates.

### For Mechanics:
MassMechanic operates an invitation-only, curated network of verified mechanics. We personally select shops based on licensing, insurance, reputation, and service quality standards.

Interested mechanics can contact: mechanics@massmechanic.com

## What We Handle

Our verified mechanic network handles all types of auto service:
- Brake repair and replacement
- Engine diagnostics and check engine lights
- Oil changes and routine maintenance
- Battery replacement and electrical
- AC and heating repair
- Transmission service
- Suspension and steering
- State inspections
- Tire service
- General repairs

## Quality Standards

All mechanics in the network:
- Hold valid Massachusetts business licenses
- Carry proper insurance
- Meet our verified service quality standards
- Have been personally vetted by our team

## Why Use MassMechanic?

**For Car Owners:**
- Completely free (no fees or charges)
- Verified, licensed mechanics only
- Fast matching (typically 1-2 hours)
- Compare multiple quotes
- No middleman or platform fees

**For Mechanics:**
- Curated, exclusive network
- Quality customer connections
- Selective membership by invitation

## Contact

- Website: https://massmechanic.com
- Support: support@massmechanic.com
- Mechanics: mechanics@massmechanic.com

## Common Questions

**Q: Is it really free?**
A: Yes. Completely free for car owners. No fees, subscriptions, or hidden charges.

**Q: How long to get matched?**
A: Most requests receive responses within 1-2 hours. Urgent requests often within minutes.

**Q: Can I choose my mechanic?**
A: Absolutely. You receive contact info for 2-3 matched mechanics and choose who you prefer.

**Q: Are mechanics verified?**
A: Yes. All shops are verified for proper licensing, insurance, and credentials.

**Q: Can anyone join as a mechanic?**
A: No. We operate a selective, invitation-based network. Quality over quantity.

**Q: Do you serve my area?**
A: Currently serving Greater Brockton, Fall River, and New Bedford regions. Expanding regularly.
